content: PFTH SD Zi Self-drilling framing screws Flat truss-head interior metal framing screw (zinc-plated) for fastening stud to track ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling Lightning Tip – upgraded to be Hilti’s fastest, most reliable interior framing screws Extra-robust – built specifically to resist head breakage and tip burn, saving you wasted screws Faster drilling speed – sharpened tips help the screws to efficiently pierce metal Better drywall finish – reduced head stand-off makes it easier to create a flush surface without rework Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Applications Fastening metal studs to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) Fastening wire lath to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Truss head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Truss head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 12 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2297640 - Drywall screw S-DD10-12x3/4 PFTH3 02 - Package Size 7500 pc - 3700858 - S-DD10-12x3/4 PFTH3 ZN 02 - 1/2 PAL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 180000x Drywall screw S-DD10-12x3/4 PFTH3 02 - 3700857 - S-DD10-12x3/4 PFTH3 ZN 02 - PAL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 360000x Drywall screw S-DD10-12x3/4 PFTH3 02
